a.title: Learn more about School District of Cadott Community
a.span: Go to School District of Cadott Community Information

div.p: The district is currently in the process of organizing enrollment for its 2020-2021 4K program. If you have a child who will be 4 years old by September 1st, 2020 and would like enroll in our program, please fill out the 2020-2021 4K Pre-Registration for 4K form.

Information about the Cadott Community School District's annual report can be found in the Google Slides presentation titled Budget Hearing/Annual Meeting. More information can also be found in the Annual Report Booklet.

a.span: Read more on District Annual Report

div.p: Would you like to be a Hornet? Open enrollment for schools starts February 3rd, 2020 and runs through April 20th, 2020. If you would like to enroll your child in Cadott Community School District, please fill out this Open Enrollment Form and submit it to our district office.

div.a: Read more on Memorial Day--No School

div.h3: 8th Annual AP District Honor Roll Recipient

div.div: Cadott High School was an 8th Annual AP District Honor Roll Recipient.
